P-Channel Counterpart: LSJ689

For more information on this part, click here.

Higher Noise Version: LSK589

For more information on this part, click here

The LSK 489 series of high performance monolithic dual JFETs features extremely low noise, tight offset voltage and low drift over temperature specifications, and is targeted for use in a wide range or precision instrumentation applications. This series has a wide selection of offset and drift specifications. The SST series SO-8 package provided ease of manufacturing and the symmetrical pinout prevents improper orientation. The SO-8 package is available with tape and reel options for compatibility with automatic assembly methods.

frontmatter.title: LSK489
frontmatter.description: This dual N-Channel JFET amplifier is designed to provide a balance between very low noise (en = 1.8nV/√Hz) and very low input capacitance (Ciss = 4pF).
